1682430.name: Music Label Manager Demo
1682430.description:
MusicLabelManager is a music industry simulator that allows players to create and run their own record label. Players take the role of CEO and try to make their mark on the music industry. The game has a database with more than 1000 real artists with stats for 2021. Music awards, singles, concert tours, streaming services and much more. The best music tycoon on the market!

Six different music genres




Everyone is a challenge!
Hit the charts in any genre and claim a special award!

Manage every aspect of your growing business




Create album, single and concert tour!
Collect points, open departments and also release mixteps, remixes of famous hits and concert stars!

Sign a contract with your favorite artist




More than 1000 real artists with stats for 2021!
Unlock new levels and new artists!

Social Media




Improve your social media marketing!
Collect marketing points and promote your artists

From a startup to an international corporation




Complete tasks and upgrade your label!
Each level of development is different

Business

The most important goal of business is to earn money


Earn, invest and get rich!

Worldwide music market




Over 2,000 interesting facts from the music world!
Updated for 2021

The demo version allows you to play 100 rounds.

In the full version, there will also be a stock exchange and a lot of investment opportunities. If you have an idea for new features, please write to us on Facebook!

Create your Music Empire!
2021 Edition
1682430.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
